summary: Plan and build an e-commerce website to sell handmade items such as pythliner keychains, flowers, photo frames, and bone hangings.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Handmade crafts shop logo, simple line-art emblem (crafts-logo.dim_512x512.png)
- Warm handmade crafts hero banner with subtle paper texture and small illustrated motifs (crafts-hero.dim_1600x600.png)
- Set of four minimal category icons in a cohesive style: keychain, flower, photo frame, hanging ornament (category-icons-sprite.dim_1024x256.png)

existing_features.title: Create a public storefront with a home page and product catalog focused on handmade items (pythliner keychains, flowers, photo frames, bone hangings). The catalog must support browsing by category and viewing a product detail page with images, price, description, and availability.

Implement shopping cart functionality: add-to-cart from catalog/detail, update quantities, remove items, and show cart subtotal. Cart state must persist during navigation and reload (e.g., local storage).

Create a checkout flow that collects buyer details (name, phone/email, shipping address, optional order notes) and places an order into the backend. Show an order confirmation screen with an order ID.
Add a simple navigation structure (header with shop name, links to Home/Catalog/Cart) and a footer with basic shop info. All user-facing text must be in English.

Establish a coherent, creative visual theme suitable for a handmade crafts shop (color palette, typography, spacing, components) and apply it consistently across all pages (avoid a generic default look).
Add required generated images to the project as static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated and render them in the UI (do not serve generated images through the backend).

new_feature_requests.summary: Create an e-commerce website for selling handmade crafts (e.g., pythliner keychains, flowers, photo frames, bone hangings).

Backend: implement Motoko data models and APIs to manage products and orders within the single main actor. Include functions to list products, get a product by ID, create an order, and fetch order details by ID.
